text: Emanibhabe ami apanake ekati um'matera madhye prerana karechi. Tadera purbe aneka um'mata atikranta hayeche. Yate apani taderake ai nirdesa suniye dena, ya ami apanara kache prerana karechi. Tathapi tara dayamayake asbikara kare. Balunah tini'i amara palanakarta. Tini byatita kara'o upasana na'i. Ami tamra upara'i bharasa karechi ebam tamra dike'i amara pratyabartana.
